spells.description: Equip: Your healing and damage periodic spells grant 150 Intellect each time they heal or deal damage. Lasts 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,162 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 99,513 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
